lines.name: Cat
lines.line: As I tried to explain, it's forbidden and dangerous to enter this pyramid. And, Congratulations! You annoyed Anubis, what a mess.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Alright, I will help you more.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: First of all, you haven't been teleported to another place, just to another time.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: You're in the same pyramid you wanted so much to visit and plunder, relax.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Now you can see how it was at the beginning. When it was just achieved.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Oh! But maybe you just want to go back to your time, and as I am the kindest goddess here (yes I know I'm the only one) I will help you.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Returning to your time is not an easy task, I don't have the power to make you return in the 21st century.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: And even if I was able to, I don't want to do it. You came here to explore, you will explore, be happy!

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: You need 3 artefacts to go home : mine, Sobek's and Ra's.

lines.name: Cat
lines.line: Oh, by the way, I'm Bastet. Sometimes I forget that some new humans don't know my name.
